website_summaries.verdict: Mat appears simple, but the soft and durable design can be enjoyed by all dogs.
pros: Non-slip bottom keeps mat from sliding around the crate
Thin mat is easy to wash and is safe for the dryer
Mat is soft and inviting, despite being on the thin side
Durable mat can withstand scratching and digging
cons: Mat is only available in limited sizes

customer_reviews.title: I really hate to leave feedback like this
customer_reviews.text: I really hate to leave feedback like this, but: if your dog acts more human and doesn't scratch his/her sleeping space as dogs are prone to do, then they're okay....but if like many dogs, they love to scratch first and get their "bed ready", forget it. The plush fibers pull right out. As of the time of this writing, ALL of these pads I've purchased are now in the garbage can and already gone. For small dogs that do what my rescues do, these pose a health threat, i.e., if the dogs swallow too much of this, there could be problems. I actually had these fibers strewn all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: Contemplative Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My dog has definitely put this through the ringer and it's still kicking...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has definitely put this through the ringer and it's still kicking. My very destructive/aggressive chewer beagle has destroyed EVERY single bed we have bought her. She suffers from some separation anxiety so she gets into mischief while in her crate. This is the only mat that has actually worked. We had some issues with her going to the bathroom in the crate so there were some times we had to wash the mat daily. The mat is still in great condition even after her wear and tear and the constant washing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my dog but my cat loves it instead!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and so does my cat! I originally bought this bed for one of my small dogs (I have three) but once my cat laid on it she took to it instead! My cat does NOT share with my dogs so it became a cat bed. I have no complaints though because she lays there now instead of tearing up my furniture with her claws!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Y

customer_reviews.title: Cat Nap Mat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mats to use in my hard sided travel carrier for each of my cats during a long distance move. I purchased the small size and it is just slightly larger than the size of my carrier, which isn't a problem at all, the sides of the mat just go up the sides of the carrier. When not in the carriers, these provide a nice little bed for my cats to sleep on. Though not super cushy, my cats enjoy taking naps on this. Wherever I place it around my house, I will usually find a cat resting on it later. I have been very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kittiesinthetwincities

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.  Stupid packing/ shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat. Sized to fit in a crate or can be used as a place to nap. Plush on top, durable and holds up to machine washing. No-slip backing. Only problem - WHY did they ship this in such a huge box? Holy cow! They could have rolled it up and the package would have been so much smaller. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect in my 13 x 18 kennel
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect in my 13 x 18 kennel. We took out the plastic crate and are using this as my dog constantly tried to chew at the plastic crate. She uses this without issue, I wish I could say the same for the bed/topper we placed on top of this (which was from the same manufacturer) - as it was immediately tore into by my 5 pound terrorizing Maltese. I would not recommend this as the only bedding you use for your dog if their comfort is a concern as it is really thin. I view it more as a liner/base than an actual dog bed. It is probably about 1/4th of an inch thick.
customer_reviews.author: C. WILLIAMSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS GOOD THIS TIME
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in 2015, but this one is NOT made of the same material, is NOT as soft and plush, and just slides around and doesn't stay in place where put. I do NOT like this product -- please stop making this product the way it now is, and go back to using the same soft and comfortable material it used to be made from !!! Please take this product back, and send me one that is the same as what I had bought in 2015 !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jkking1952

customer_reviews.title: excellent rabbit lounger
customer_reviews.text: Our rabbits LOVE this. This is easy to clean, durable and inexpensive enough that if our rabbits end up chewing them up we could still replace. So far they have dug at it a little and it is still completely unaffected. Very happy with the quality for the inexpensive price. Finally something we can use for their comfort that can be cleaned easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Never stays put & sheds everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love having a pad in the bottom of our new puppy crate. I HATE the fact that I have to unroll it multiple times a day, after the puppy has managed to pull it into her side of the crate (I have a divider in the crate for now.) Also frustrating is the amount of black fluff that it sheds EVERYWHERE. If it could be made to stay in one place better (clips on the ends maybe?) and to not fall apart, we'd be okay with it. As it is, I'm afraid to wash it because the material may fall out & gunk up my machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Use for New Puppy or Kitten ONLY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unpractical, nice for a new puppy, or use as oversized Pot Holder. Bottom is very slippery. It’s very thin. It’s about 18 inches long and about 10 inches across.
customer_reviews.author: Pegi Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great little dog beds
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these beds, they are soft but durable. I would definitely recommend. It says not to dry them but I have multiple times (not for an extended time, just until dry) and they're still in great shape. I think this may be due to the backing but I dry them with their blankets and the towels I used to bathe them with. They are still soft and the backing has remained intact. I use them in an oval dog bed. My dogs sleep on these pads and use a light weight blanket on top, as needed. One of my cats also likes to sleep with the dogs and likes this bed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought, but my cats LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: So I wasn't sure about the size, since our exotics are small cats - however they shed a lot. I gave it five stars because despite of the sizing, they LOVE sitting on it, it doesn't move, and it's so easy to clean their fur off of it - all we had to do was literally brush it with our hand. We'll probably get larger ones at one point and use these for their crates, but we definitely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Naama E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Washable and has stayed soft
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pad in my puppy's crate for the past three weeks. I have washed it everyday, just in case my puppy has peed on it. It's hard to know sometimes if he has or not! It's washable and is somewhat waterproof. I like that it keeps him dry at night.
customer_reviews.author: kldice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.  Very thin.
customer_reviews.text: These are the thinnest pads I have ever purchased. They provide almost no cushioning and slip and slide all over the carrier. The only positive it that they actually fit various size crates. They do appear that they will be durable enough to stand up to infrequent washings.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Can't use with scratchers!
customer_reviews.text: As some other people have mentioned, these are destroyed within the first night by any dog that scratches around to get comfortable. We bought 2 of these for 2 separate dogs, and both have been destroyed sadly. They are extremely soft and plush, but also very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's thin
customer_reviews.text: The seller was great. This item arrived promptly and was described accurately, except for the thickness, as others have noted here. (I should have paid attention before ordering.) In the photo, the product appears to be about an inch thick. It's actually about the thickness of a pot holder. If the postage to return this for a refund didn't cost almost as much as the item, I'd send it back. Next time, I'll buy a bath mat. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Michele Defilippo

customer_reviews.title: Love the Material But it’s Too Thin
customer_reviews.text: It’s VERY thin, no padding and it slips all over the crate despite non-slip backing. On the positive side it’s extremely soft. I’m using it in my puppies crate but I layered it on top of another blanket for more cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expexted
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to put in my dogs old carrying case of 11 years that he absolutely loves. Dont know what happen. To the old one buy this fit perfectly, matched perfectly and just the right amount of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. It is a thinner mat and not a fluffy padded bed. Being thin and lightweight makes it easy to transport to different classes and places as a "wait" location for my male German Shepherd Dog. I have washed it several times with very satisfactory results. This is the second mat of this style I have - the first one is smaller for my female GSD. We have had the smaller mat for several years. It needed a small bit of outer edge seam repair just recently, which was easy to do. I am happy we purchased both of these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this was going to be thicker and bigger than it is. Disappointed all around, However, for the price I decided to keep it and change thing around in the kennel. Hooch will lay on it but I know that it cannot be comfortable. However, it will do for now. Even though it says a large it truly is not.Would be better suited to a Jack Russell than a Rottweiler. On the plus side, it is well made and the top part is fuzzy and feels snuggly. Even the ferrets love to crawl on top of it and roll around.
customer_reviews.author: Carla J. King

customer_reviews.title: The material/matting comes off unusually easy. Every time my dog got off it
customer_reviews.text: The material/matting comes off unusually easy. Every time my dog got off it, there was a trail of black fluff in her wake. I'd constantly have to be picking them up/vacuuming them, all over the house. It's not always accurate to say "You get what you pay for," but in this case...this pet bed is cheaply made, and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Just_Oreo

customer_reviews.title: Puppy liked it
customer_reviews.text: The puppy liked it, though sometimes I think it was too thin because he'd go under it or shove it out of the way and just sleep on the floor of the crate. When I put a blanket in with him, he always curled up in it, so that's why I assume the mat was a little too thin for him.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Cooper

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, does the job. It's like having a bath mat in the crate. It's very thin. However, product arrived as described. My dog pushes it up in the crate to bunch it into a softer lump to lay against.
customer_reviews.author: McCanta

customer_reviews.title: Small pet mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat to chill on my desk with me while I work. It was much smaller than I expected, maybe I wrote the measurements down wrong when I was looking at it. Nonetheless, my cat was grateful either way and will curl herself up to fit on it. Good for pet carriers but as a table top mat it kind of slides around a bit. For reference, my cat is 8lbs and flufffffy!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: This has its Pros and Cons!
customer_reviews.text: I try to buy dog mats for my Pug because he will EAT the stuffing out of regular beds. I saw this and I was happy to see it looked comfty and with very little stuffing. I thought the 18" x 13" was going to fit my puppy but rather looks like it is for teacup dogs, toy breeds or Chihuahuas. I put it outside in the terrace and eventually my dog went to investigate the strange object. He liked it and doesn't chew on it but eventually you need to remember you are not purchasing something fancy or stylish. But for the purpose I bought it ... I'M DEFINITELLY HAPPY :)
customer_reviews.author: Adriana D

customer_reviews.title: approved by 3 dogs (and 1 human) so far
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these when they were $4.99 and so far I've liked them. I foster dogs and this offers an inexpensive thing to put in their crate until I can determine if they will in some way destroy the more expensive bedding. On that note, some of the fosters have had accidents on them which means washing them (also done in between fosters) and they continue to hold up after washing. While it may not be as comfortable as the big plush bedding, I've had three fosters so far and all of them have loved it and one even went in on his own to catch a nap on it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Furniture saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo...we have a LOT of pets! Our biggest is a husky, and his claws and fur are torture on our couches. I wanted something that I could put on the couch cushions that would protect them when the dogs are climbing up and down. These are PERFECT! I will try to take pictures soon. The critters love laying on these, and my cushions are completely protected from claws. When we sit there, we just remove them, and we get no hair all over our butts! We ordered 3, and I am so glad I did. HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Fits 22 inch XS crate
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time finding a mat that fits my new crate. this doesnt fit perfect, but will work for trips to the vet. This is the midwest homes 22" crate
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Grab A Towel
customer_reviews.text: Mats were undersized, woefully thin and shed fibers like a golden retriever in springtime. Your four foot deserves and needs better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: CatRescue center
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and launders well. We use at our Cat Rescue center where bedding is washed often. Cats snuggle up on the soft mats and seem to appreciate. The beds get muddy with red dirt that stains. These are perfect. You can't see the red dirt...and they are holding up to frequent laundering. Do not seem to hold water so work well in areas that do get splash back in heavy rains.
customer_reviews.author: susan osako

customer_reviews.title: Happy warm little puppies.
customer_reviews.text: This item checked all the boxes for me, comfortable, affordable, washable, and durable. I had two little hyper, teething puppies in a crate with it, and it’s still intact, just like their momma!
customer_reviews.author: UCD_Ag

customer_reviews.title: Not a thick cushiony bed - but a perfectly nice kennel mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got sent the wrong size on a warehouse deal, much too small, but I reordered the correct size at full price as this is exactly what I was looking for! Not too thick or full of stuffing, just a nice soft mat for the kennel while my new dog is being trained. This will be easy to wash and is not so expensive I'll be upset if it's destroyed!
customer_reviews.author: 🌟 Emma Elizabeth 🌟

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Crate Liner
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a crate pad, and it works wonderfully for that. I wouldn't want to stick a bulky bed into my dog's crate but I don't want them to have to sleep on the hard plastic either, and this is a great product for that purpose; however, I would not use this as a regular dog bed for outside of a crate or kennel. It's pretty much as plushy as a softer carpet. In his boredom, my dog has unleashed his wrath upon this and it has held up, so it is durable, at least against my 10lb puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: We thought that this was going to be a good purchase until about a week after receiving it when the backing starting coming off in the kennel. The little beads on the back for the non-stick functionality have all basically come off. Many came off in the kennel but mainly came off in the washing machine after 1 wash. (we did not appreciate having to clean up the mess either inside the washing machine) This item no longer works (it slides all over the place) and was a total waste of our money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the back seat of jeep
customer_reviews.text: I do 95% of my shopping on Amazon, as it saves me time a the store, and lets face it, I'm from the Houston area, I HATE traffic, road rage isn't very becoming! hahaha. From toilet paper to my furbabies needs, it's purchased on Amazon. I would definitely recommend this, as it's description is on point, and exceeded my expectations. **** I did NOT receive this item at a discounted rate, nor am I affiliated with Amazon... I just love amazon that much! ****
customer_reviews.author: km in tx

customer_reviews.title: Very soft but a little slippery
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great pad but didn’t work for what I needed it for. My ShihTzu has to spend 90% of his time in a crate for the next 10 weeks while recouping from a very serious leg surgery. No walking and absolutely no slippery surfaces. This pad is so soft it’s actually slippery. So we couldn’t use it. However this pad would be awesome for a healthy pet!
customer_reviews.author: D.Walling / Ariz.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kennel pad
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fits medium kennel perfect. Pad is thin and perfect for summer. Super easy to throw in washer and dryer and comes out good as new. Wouldn't recommend for older dog that needs a lot of padding because of thinness however, perfect for putting under a puppy you are house training or a nursing litter due to how well it launders.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Good materials and workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to put on the scoops of our cat house. The top layer is super soft, pet-able, even. They are a little thicker than a potholder, made well, with quality materials. The backing is non-slip, which I needed for the cat house. So far the cats seem to like it. I found one of the cats that doesn't usually hang out in the bottom scoop taking a nap down there. The mats haven't moved out of place, even with the traffic they've had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft!
customer_reviews.text: These do what intended to do and are INCREDIBLY soft. My cats love them, but they are very thin so be aware of where you're putting them.
customer_reviews.author: SQuigley

customer_reviews.title: Plain, simply yet so perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to take the stuffing out of his beds; I cannot tell you how many times I've bought him fluffy and comfy beds ... but he seems to see them more as toys rather than beds. I was looking for some sort of mat with little or no stuffing but comfortable for him at the same time. This was just perfect for him. It's furry but flat, so eventually if he bites it ... there's nothing to pull out of it. If you have the same problem ... This might help! Plus they have all sort of sizes. I got a medium (30" x19") for a Pug. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Adriana D

customer_reviews.title: Plush and soft pet carrier liner
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to put in a soft sided pet carrier for my cat, see pic of the pad in the crate below. The material is soft and plush. It was the perfect size and added some softness to the hard foam mat that came with the crate. I left the crate on the floor for my cat to explore for a few days and she seems to like the mat and crate. I would purchase again and recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Raoul Duke online shopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I was anticipating, but it's soft and has good padding. My dog, who has arthritis, likes sitting on it. I think it may be soothing to her joints. Easier on the joints than carpet or hard floor. She liked it. So if you have a small dog, like a mini dachshund, it's the perfect size, but a medium dog, like my lhasa apso, it will be slightly too small. It's a good buy for what your paying.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Not a dog bed
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was more of a dog bed when I ordered it the same time I ordered the crate, I finally took it out of the box this morning and was kind of shocked at how thin it is, sure not much padding, I guess that is why it's cheaper, I wish I had read some of the reviews before I ordered it because I would have ordered a different one. Like others have said, it's more of a thin mat , I guess it will be better than just laying on the plastic tray that's in the bottom of the crate though.
customer_reviews.author: Kay A

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lightweight mat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice price and added warm Yes I’m fits inside the pet cage or use as a mat. Very easy to clean and nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie h

customer_reviews.title: Bunny bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bunny’s cage since a really puffy bed wouldn’t fit well in it. I thought it was too thin but apparently she loves it. She lays on it all the time. Works for her so as long as she’s comfortable and happy, I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves it. Durable and soft.
customer_reviews.text: It has survived our 4 mo pug so far! He has chewed 2 cage size ones in a month. This one is doing much better!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rennie

customer_reviews.title: A shedding nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Although my dog seems to love her new bed and it fits her crate perfectly, it is nothing short of a shedding nightmare. I have vacuumed, shaken out and washed the bed but each time my dog comes off the mat she brings fuzz from the bedding. I am continuously vacuuming or picking up pieces of the mat off my floor and carpet.
customer_reviews.author: CAP11

customer_reviews.title: Mat looks fluffy, right? It really isn't.
customer_reviews.text: The photo of this mat looks like it would be pretty padded but it isn't at all. It's quite thin. The back has vinyl dots so it's supposed to grip the crate pan, but in my car it ends up sliding around with the dog on it and being bunched up. Here are my comments to two claims they make in the product description: - Luxurious plush sleeper bed for both dogs and cats - not luxurious feeling - maybe luxurious looking but it's just fake fur - Non Skid backing for secure placement - definitely not secure It was inexpensive, so you get what you pay for. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: jdub

customer_reviews.title: Thin, creates fuzz from minimal scratching, not holding up very well
customer_reviews.text: After using this probably 10 times the fuzz is all over our car. Our dog only scratches at it minimally when he's trying to make a nest out of it, and it isn't holding up very well at all. I will end up making something myself that has more cushion and will hold up better. It is very thin and doesn't provide much cushion. The best thing about it is that it looks good and fits the crate well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, still waiting on my 23x16 liner(missing)
customer_reviews.text: I also bought a 23x16 SnooZZy Quilted Kennel Petmate liner and it was not in my package with the other 4 smaller Kennel liners. I am still missing one pad from my order. Other than that I love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene L. Walcott

customer_reviews.title: Great for a crate, not so good as a bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a mat. It's very large (my fault for not measuring), but thin. It is like a slick, polyester-covered floor mat. My dog is okay with it, but he doesn't seem comfortable like he did with the bed this was purchased to replace. If you're looking for something to put in the bottom of a crate, this is great. It's easy to toss in the washer. If you're looking for a bed, this isn't what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Susanls67

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not chew proof.
customer_reviews.text: I love this "bed" so much I've purchased it twice. We used it as a crate liner. However, my lab has chewed apart the binding in less than 2 days both times. I am still giving this 4 stars because the product wasn't created to be chewed on. My dog just tries to chew anything she is left unattended with. If you found this review helpful, please indicate so by clicking the yes button below!
customer_reviews.author: SomeSpecialLady

customer_reviews.title: Thick like an oven mitt
customer_reviews.text: Thick like an oven mitt, fuzzy and slightly non slip. Was supposed to fit into my carrier according to the dimensions but it is a smidge too big. My cat likes it though and it's washable so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: crs

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this and another larger one I have. First I had it on my bed for a cat, to reduce the hair he always leaves behind. Now I have a bed for him and put this on a living room chair. It works great. The cats love it and when anyone wants to sit down they only need to move this mat rather than use a lint roller on the entire seat.
customer_reviews.author: PCF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 1 year old kittens crate to give it some cushion to lay on, Its a perfect fit and gives just the right amount of cushion for the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Wright

customer_reviews.title: Product did what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and the cat liked it ok too. It fits well in his travel carrier and has a nonskid backing. I just wanted to add a little cushion between Clyde and the carrier and it accomplishes this. I wouldn't call it a bed though, it's a mat. It cut down on his meowing the first 2 hour trip we took in the car with it, not so much the next time though! I would recommend if you just want a mat for the bottom of a carrier so the cat won't slide around as much.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great pet bed/cover
customer_reviews.text: These pads are great. I wash them in a pillow case and if any nubbins come off all I do is turn it inside out over a large plastic bag, shake gently and the case is ready for the next pad washing. I have six, cats love them and I have an extra large on top of my German Shepherd's orthopedic bed. Sure beats taking off the bed cover.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Price gouge!!
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent choice except the PRICE WENT FROM 12. Up to 18. So no more for me - too bad too - becaus I had told my show friends about them and they said they’d rather see their own for that high price
customer_reviews.author: Kim Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Skid proof
customer_reviews.text: The rubber bits on the bottle prevent it from sliding around. Its great!
customer_reviews.author: D&R

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For less than a fiver, this is great value. It's not a thick, cushy pad. It's a warm, soft blanket-thickness pad that does a nice job of lining a box or cage or other sleeping place. I lined a basket my cats had shown an interest in, and now it's a favorite spot. Just enough padding and warmth to make a good nap spot a great one.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Is Thankful
customer_reviews.text: so soft and durable to use in my travel pet carrier and washes and dries perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Peachee Keene

customer_reviews.title: I dealt with tapeworms last year and the dry segments that fall from their bums everywhere look VERY similar to these little dot
customer_reviews.text: Soft, durable pet bed mat. I do want to say that the "no skid" backing tiny dots do start falling off after washing (air dry and cold wash) and I thought my dogs had tapeworms until I figured out where the little cream colored specs were coming from. I dealt with tapeworms last year and the dry segments that fall from their bums everywhere look VERY similar to these little dots so don't be fooled like me!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Small pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons puppy, to go in his crate. It is alot smaller than I had expected and not very thick. It is easy to clean but I wish I would have gotten a bigger one. Overall it is a good product and perfect for a small puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sleepers. They wash well and are very durable. One thing my dogs have yet to tear up. If they have an accident on one of these in the crate overnight, it goes right through to a potty pad underneath it. That keeps a big mess down and less for me to clean. I have bought many sizes and many different colors in these and love them all!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Pad is only 1/2 inch thick, not 4 inches
customer_reviews.text: Description is misleading. Nice looking pad, quilted, dark brown -- however it's only 1/2 inch thick, not 4 inches as described. Wouldn't have bought it had I known how thin it is. Not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Granny K.

customer_reviews.title: ... it does but for some reason he does not like it and he claws and bunches it up until ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our large dog and his new crate it's made to fit perfectly and it does but for some reason he does not like it and he claws and bunches it up until it's in the corner that he's not laying on. I finally gave up and took it out, folded it up and put it on top of the crate, hopefully in the winter time maybe he'll enjoy the warmth it might bring.
customer_reviews.author: Shells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a crate
customer_reviews.text: Great little mat for use in a crate. It’s very thin but easy to clean And the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for kitties too!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this! She is a medium sized cat, and she loves to sit in the “loafing” position on small fabric surfaces. Spoiled, I know. But this is great for her!
customer_reviews.author: Rio Grassmyer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Us
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something easy to wash and move around for our Boxer cause we've gone through quite a few dog beds. So I picked this up. It just didn't work for him. I know its just a mat, but expected a little padding in it & really there isn't. Its as flat as can be, so our dog refuses to lay on it. My husband padded up a make shift bed for the time being and laid the mat on top of it, and our dog purposely drags it off. And for the price I expected a little more, you can can a big dog bed at Costco for $29.00.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndeanne

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Useful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an inexpensive add on item with another product. It's a simple pad that can be used for inside a kennel or to have an inexpensive mat for your pet. I've placed mine on my balcony so my chihuahua has a place to lay but if weather or insects get to it it will be fairly simple to clean. It's not very padded so that's my only complaint, it really is just a mat but that's all I needed :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Moxie

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this "pet sleeper" to accomodate a young goldendoodle that I was petsitting. It was to be his designated "place" while in my home. While it served it's purpose, and the dog knew what it was for and layed on it comfortably, he maganged to chew a hole in it when left unsupervised for a short time when he returned home, a reason why this mat-type bed was chosen (he takes the stuffing out of everything, i.e the last dog bed, being a stuffed one). At times he preferred to lay on the hard tile floor...perhaps it was cooler. Otherwise it seems to be a durable mat for a non-chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carrier or car seat. Very soft and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Nottemporary

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, we bought another
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the little "houses" that were not well padded on our new car tree. The first one fit snugly in the larger house; it became a favored sleeping spot for our multiple cats. We doubled over the second pad for the smaller house, and it is now occupied most of the time, too.
customer_reviews.author: OldLeslie

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved it. He destroyed it in 13 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: carl allen

customer_reviews.title: Its a bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Its okay..... Nothing special and honestly I should have just gone to a regular store and gotten it in the bath aisle and no one would have known the difference. I don't see how this is a "pet item" but my dog gets too hot in his kennel (where he sleeps at night) with his regular dog bed. He was pushing the dog bed out of the kennel and sleeping on the plastic base so I thought this would be a great idea (not too hot and fluffy like the dog bed but not the hard plastic base).
customer_reviews.author: Professormom

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty small, but for just over $5 what can you expect. My french bulldog goes through these like she has an endless supply. Some kennel liners say they are "machine washable", but really would you put that in the same washer you wash your own clothes in? I don't and won't ever do that.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have old deaf and blind dogs, many pee in their sleep. These mats wash and dry perfectly and remain looking like new. Wish I had gotten them sooner. The young and healthy dogs like them too.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Martin

customer_reviews.title: beautiful & soft
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this pad. When I first got it I put it down on the floor & she walked right over to it & layed down on it & stayed there for a few minutes. She got up because I walked away from it & she stays with me. It is so nice, I don't leave it on the floor. But every time I put it down for her she goes right to it. It is very soft & nice looking. I take it outside for her so that she has a nice soft place to sleep. Then I pick it back up because it is too nice to leave on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: true crime reader

customer_reviews.title: Car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my vehicle and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not supportive
customer_reviews.text: We actually purchased this so that we could place it under our dog’s metal crate and not have it scratch our floor. It will work for that use great. I wouldn’t say it’s got enough stuffing to be supportive of a little pup or dog as a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bella B

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is what I get for buying cheaper This mat wasn't anything what I expected. It was extremely cheap. I washed it once on delicate & cold water. Then I dried it in low tumble dry and all of the beads on the bottom of the Mat fell off and were everywhere and the outside edge sewing came undone.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: this is just perfect for my puppy and her crate
customer_reviews.text: this is just perfect for my puppy and her crate. I love it because it does have he rubber packing and is machine washable. The softness is comfy for my Sofie too. Thanks, Cin Cin
customer_reviews.author: CinCin4275

customer_reviews.title: Dog Quilt serves as a day and nighttime Sleeping rug.
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves it and she is a fuse pot I bought a second one for the bedroom. Also price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine N. Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft, Still Bunches Up
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft and nice, but unfortunately, it does not stay in place in the carrier, which is why I bought it. It immediately bunches up in the back, despite the "non-skid" backing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Decker

customer_reviews.title: My Lab/Weimaraner, Female 50#, 1 year old mix ...
customer_reviews.text: My Lab/Weimaraner , Female 50#, 1 year old mix, had a piece chewed out in under 10 minutes. This is not at all chew proof, even with the bitters spray. This was on the floor for her to just lay on when out and about the house. The mat was very thin and slipped all over my wood floor, cheaply made not plush by any means. Perhaps suitable for a very small dog. It is not as described and would not purchase again. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft.. good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Well it's for my dog so I can speak to the actual Comfort level but my doggy seems to love it...it also fits well inside his crate..
customer_reviews.author: Scope

customer_reviews.title: Great floor protection & added warmth
customer_reviews.text: I got my first SnooZZy when I first adopted my turtle who lives indoors in 2007. I placed it under one of his hides to provide comfort rather than just the lineoleum floor. It washes and wears well. A few years later we adopted a Russian Tortoise which meant more hides and an igloo. After years of turtle blankies I finally decided to make it look neat with a SnooZZy under each hide and the basking log.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Nice pet bed
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and have bought a few in different sizes and colors for my bunnies to have a soft spot to nap and relax. Follow the washing instructions though--- either air dry or tumble dry very low heat. Otherwise the tiny little rubbery dots on the back fall off and end up all over your dryer or in the lint trap.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit and descent quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fit in the Midwest iCrate Double-Door Folding Metal Dog Crate, 30 Inches by 19 Inches. I bought this to bring home a new whoodle puppy and it has kept her happily kenneled every night for the last month or so. It washes up nicely and she has yet to chew through it, which is more than I can say for my carpet. I wish it were a bit thicker or plusher maybe, but for the price I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Mama

customer_reviews.title: Thin and fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for about 4 washes, it has these beads on the bottom that fall off when you wash the mat and get all in your washer. My dogs chewed hold in it within the first week. They are pretty thin. It was a waste of money to me.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: For spoiled brats
customer_reviews.text: Spoiled Pom cat refuses to sleep on it unless it has the BLUE bath mat under it. Then he doesn’t have to scratch it into shape
customer_reviews.author: smitee

customer_reviews.title: so soft
customer_reviews.text: When we first got this bed, I thought it doesn't look fluffy enough. It can't possibly be comfortable for the dog. Then I took a better look at it and it is so soft. Its not very thick or fluffy, and it doesn't need to be. Its a nice bed, and it was a great price also. I'm happy that it can be machine washed and dried. Accidents happen, and our last dog bed we had to throw out right away when our puppy had an accident. I don't have to worry about that with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to vacuum and dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: I put this on top of a memory foam bed and my German Shepherd likes it. It is very easy to vacuum and keeps fur off of the bed which is harder to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mattevia

customer_reviews.title: Great - they were a little hesitant for awhile - ...
customer_reviews.text: Great - they were a little hesitant for awhile - now they really like using it. We use it on a coffee table and on a sewing machine - they like the extra comfort
customer_reviews.author: RKAZ

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little mat for in the bottom of a crate but not something I would use for a dog bed. I was actually looking for something thinner for my pup who chews everything hoping that she wouldn't chew this. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy1972

customer_reviews.title: ... as I opened the package I was a little disappointed as it is very thin
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit as soon as I opened the package I was a little disappointed as it is very thin. For the price, I will keep it anyway. Not really heavy enough to be a soft pad for a dog crate. I will put a piece of foam under it.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Engel

customer_reviews.title: Great protector for leather chair
customer_reviews.text: These are a great protector from claws on my furniture. I have 2 that I place over the chairs my animals are always on that are leather. This keeps their claws from marking the leather and they love to lay on it because it's so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog's crate to provide a light cushion for her to sleep on. It looked simple and easy to wash. I wasn't looking for anything too thick but this is too flimsy to stay in place. It has a backing on it but it's not heavy or sticky enough to do anything. This is constantly in a pile at the back of the crate. A simple bath mat would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: swilker

customer_reviews.title: BULLDOG APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: We love this pad as much as our dog does. It's durable and seems that it will withstand the years of use to come. I would recommend this for anyone with a medium (50 lbs) dog. It lies flat and provides just enough padding and insulation. Fido loves it so much he thinks it’s a toy and it must taste pretty good too...he loves chewing on it, so there you go: Strong, durable, tasty, & comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Good Top Mat
customer_reviews.text: This crate mat wasn't super fluffy, and was on the thin side. I was thinking it was closer to a bed when I had ordered it. It's exactly what it says it is though, on par with the thickness of a quilt. Fit wonderful inside the crate, I just folded a blanket for underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

product_meta.title: Petmate SnooZZy Quilted Kennel Mat
product_meta.description: Size:50-70lbs| Color:BlackPRECISION PET 84204 Pet Supplies Kennel Mats& Liner
feature_bullets: QUILTED KENNEL MAT: This crate mat is designed for car rides, home & inside of kennels. Keep your pet cozy & while they rest in their kennel with this plush crate bed mat. Compatible with most 30 inch crates.

FOR CATS TOO: Cats & kitties will also enjoy this plush bed mat. Keep it on your furniture for pets to rest on. Non-skid backing ensures secure placement, & it easily rolls up for traveling. Machine washable. Fits 40" or 42" Crates

DOG BEDS: Pets can feel at home both in the house & on-the-go with a variety of beds for cats & dogs as well as plush kennel crate mats. Features self-warming beds, orthopedic beds for senior pets, cooling cots for outdoors, pillow beds & more.

PRECISION PET: Precision Pet offers a variety of durable products such as wire crates, chicken coops, rabbit hutches & accessories that provide pets with a cozy & safe place to rest, nest & feed. Also features litter box accessories & more.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
